game.synopsis: the main character, an immortal demon-slayer, was tasked by a powerful demon to cleanse the land of monsters and regain their favor, but the demon lied and only wanted to use the hero to replenish its supply of souls.  Inspired by this deception, the hero sets off to accomplish their goal nevertheless; the hero travels with their companion, a wolf spirit, to purge evil in the world.
game.beginning: starting in a small town, the hero meets others with special abilities, who join them on their journey to restore order.
game.ending: in the finale, the hero battles their final foe and saves the world, earning the demon’s respect.
